title: Ren and Stimpy: the stupidest stories
brief_description: Ren’s faithful friend is always accused of being stupid so these three tales will do much to allay the rumours. “Stimpy’s big day”: Stimpy can’t resist the challenge to write a Gritty Kitty Litter Jingle to win 47 million dollars and a trip to Hollywood. “The Big shot”: Stimpy has his own show and lots of money, but can this take the place of a loyal but jealous friend. “Robin Hoek”: A Ren and Stimpy remake of a classic tale featuring Robin, the lovely Maid Moron and Friar Chuck.
